info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Wayne County through 1245 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Romulus, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Taylor around 1200 AM EDT. Greenfield Village around 1205 AM EDT. Dearborn around 1215 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Inkster, Wayne, Melvindale, Westland, Allen Park, Dearborn Heights, New Boston, Lincoln Park, Garden City and Redford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
